Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel Viktoria places you in the heart of Cologne, convenient to Cologne Cable Car and Cologne Cathedral. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Cologne Zoo and Claudius Therme.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 50 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Limited parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Make yourself at home in one of the 50 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

A stay at Hotel Viktoria places you in the heart of Cologne, convenient to Cologne Cable Car and Cologne Cathedral. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Cologne Zoo and Claudius Therme.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cologne Cable Car - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Cologne Zoo - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Claudius Therme - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Cologne Trade Fair Grounds - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Musical Dome - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Hohenzollern Bridge - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Cologne Triangle Panorama - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Cologne Philharmonic - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Ludwig Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Cologne Cathedral - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Romano-Germanic Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Wallraf Square - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Great St. Martin Church - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Museum of Applied Art - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Galerie Der Spiegel - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Viktoria is Cologne (CGN-Cologne - Bonn) - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
